attributes.action: Grant Roman Abramovich a Visa to stay in UK to work
attributes.background: Roman Abramovich has be halted on a visa thus putting one of the UK's most successful clubs in danger and millions of Supporters aggrieved. UK need to ignore the stupid USA list and allow Mr Abramovich to stay and work

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure what you mean by the "USA list". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
